bug.author: wangce888
bug.description: I started a service using the docker image on the server, sent a 1000*1000 image, and it took 20 seconds to get the response, but it only took 0.x seconds to complete without serving.

comments.comment:
Could you please share a sample code snippet to reproduce this issue ? Also, please provide the following information. <denchmark-h:h3>System information</denchmark-h>
OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): TensorFlow Serving installed from (source or binary): TensorFlow Serving version:
Closing this as it is in "awaiting response" status for more than 3 days. Feel free to provide the information asked above and we will reopen. Thanks!
